Mino

Bobby

Introduction

MOBB (Korean: 맙; Japanese: モブ) was a South Korean hip hop sub-unit formed by YG Entertainment in 2016, consisting of YG labelmates Mino from WINNER and Bobby from iKON. The duo debuted on September 8, 2016 with the EP "The MOBB". They presumably disbanded on December 30, 2022, after iKON left YG Entertainment.
